thorwin.math.geo.projection

Interface MapProjection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CylindricalProjection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MercatorProjection, PlateCarreProjection

    public interface MapProjection
extends java.io.Serializable
    Map projection of a spheroid on a 2D surface.
    See Also:
    Wikipedia on Map projection

    • Method Summary

      Convert a point in 2D space to a geodetic location
      java.util.Optional<Vector2D> toPoint(double latitude, double longitude)
      Convert a location to a point in 2D space.

    • Method Detail

      • toPoint

        java.util.Optional<Vector2D> toPoint(double latitude,
                                     double longitude)
        Convert a location to a point in 2D space.
        Parameters:
        latitude - Latitude value (radians)
        longitude - Longitude value (radians)
        Returns:
        the point or null if there is no point for the specified location.

      • toGeodetic

        java.util.Optional<Geodetic> toGeodetic(double x,
                                        double y)
        Convert a point in 2D space to a geodetic location
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the location
        y - y-coordinate of the location
        Returns:
        the location, or null if there is no location for the specified point.
